runkoserver.controller

Class PersonController

  • java.lang.Object
    • runkoserver.controller.PersonController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/persons")
 @Transactional
public class PersonController
extends Object
    Controller class for HTTP requests related to Person objects.

      • updatePersonProfile

        @RequestMapping(value="/profile/edit/{id}",
                method=POST)
public String updatePersonProfile(@PathVariable
                                                                                                           Long id,
                                                                                                           org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                           String urlToPhoto,
                                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                           String description)
        POST-method to modify person's profile.
        Parameters:
        id - identifies which content is modified
        redirectAttributes - Spring object to carry redirect attributes
        urlToPhoto - link to person's photo
        description - person's profile description text
        Returns:
        redirect URL to person's updated profile
